data.name: Raygun Gadabout
data.detailed_description:
Join the Community


About the Game



Raygun Gadabout is an interplanetary action-adventure game. Battle fearsome alien foes. Explore strange new planets. Befriend strange alien lifeforms. Upgrade your abilities and your ship to reach the furthest reaches of time and space.

Story

You're a bounty hunter in training to join the elite Raygunners, but you'll have to prove you have what it takes. Travel to nearby planets with your trusty ship. Blast and cut through hordes of vile Space Pirates. Become a hero and save the galaxy!

Features

  • FAST PACED COMBAT: Fight using a variety of Rayguns with different abilities and uses. Dodge roll to close the distance and dispatch your foes with your Plasma Sword. Use your shield to reflect enemy projectiles
  • INTERPLANETARY EXPLORATION: Blast across the cosmos aboard your trusty ship. Battle alien ships in fast paced space combat. Chart strange and enormous alien worlds filled with creatures both friendly and hostile, discover secrets that will aid you on your adventure.
  • UPGRADES: Unlock new abilities to increase your combat options and allow you to explore more areas.
  • UPGRADE YOUR SHIP: Space is dangerous, take these... add more powerful weapons, radiation shields, warp drive for faster travel and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
